CustomPageWithReturn.Name: Events List with Return
CustomPageWithReturn.Title: Event List WITH RETURN
CustomPageWithReturn.BodyCopy:
One-Credit FA100 Events List

Spring 2011

This list is subject to change - check the event list regularly.

The FA100 office is located in Spori 253. All tickets are sold at the Cashiers Window in the Kimball Building.

Event dress for men means Sunday clothes or dress pants, button shirt, and tie. For women, a dress or modest skirt and a blouse is considered event dress. It is preferred young ladies do not wear denim skirts as dressy attire. The event will not count for FA100 if you are not dressed appropriately for the event. Entrance will not be denied, but the event will not count and your I-card will not be swiped.

If you are approached by an Usher regarding inappropriate behavior during an event, the event will not count towards FA100.

 

* Paid-ticket required | Building location key on bottom of list
